title: Tschima da Flix
text: Tschima da Flix is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Albula%20Alps">Albula Alps</a>, located between <a href="Piz%20Calderas">Piz Calderas</a> and <a href="Piz%20d%27Agnel">Piz d'Agnel</a>, in the canton of <a href="Graub%C3%BCnden">Graubünden</a>. On the northern side of the mountain lies a glacier named "Vadret da Calderas".
